Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_REINER>
You there. Yes, you. Can you spare a moment of
your time?

<NAME_MOB_REINER>
A pleasure to meet you. My name is <BLUE>Reiner</BLUE>, and
I'm proud to bring you a veritable panoply of
items, all at bargain prices.

<NAME_MOB_REINER>
To be honest, I first saw you at a distance, and I
was instantly impressed by how handsome and
intelligent you looked!

<NAME_MOB_REINER>
To be honest, I first saw you at a distance, and I
was instantly impressed by how attractive and
intelligent you looked!

<NAME_MOB_REINER>
Now, I have here something I think would be a
perfect fit for someone of such taste, if you can
spare just a minute of your time.
<PAGE>
I happen to have a total of <MOJI0>
<ITEMNAME0> available for sale.
<PAGE>
And -- this is the best part -- you won't believe
the price! You can own this fabulous item for
the low, low price ooooof...

<NAME_MOB_REINER>
<ITEMNAME1>G! What a steal! Why,
it'd nearly cost you more NOT to buy it!
Money: <MOJI0>G

<NAME_MOB_REINER>
An excellent decision, if I say so myself. Nothing
slips by those eagle eyes of yours! Not every day
I meet such a connoisseur.

<NAME_MOB_REINER>
Righty-o, there you are. And a warm, country
thank-you for your business.
<PAGE>
I'll be sure to let my colleagues know you're
quite the discerning customer. Why, I'm betting
they'll bring you a bountiful bevy of deals.
<PAGE>
Thank you, and have a marvelous day.

<NAME_MOB_REINER>
I see, I see. Ah well, I shan't press the issue. I
know those pushy salesman types. Can't stand
'em, that's a fact.
<PAGE>
But I WILL be sure to let my colleagues know
you're quite the discerning customer. I'm betting
a few may have offers you can't turn down!

<NAME_MOB_REINER>
Righty-o, there you are. Seems your bag's
packed with purchases at the moment, so how
about I just deliver it later?
<PAGE>
I'll be sure to let my colleagues know you're
quite the discerning customer. Why, I'm betting
they'll bring you a bountiful bevy of deals.
<PAGE>
Thank you, and have a marvelous day.

<NAME_MOB_REINER>
It seems your bag's bursting at the seams, my
friend!
<PAGE>
Anyway, I shan't press the issue. I know those
pushy salesman types. Can't stand 'em, that's a
fact.
<PAGE>
But I WILL sure to let my colleagues know you're
quite the discerning customer. I'm betting a few
of them will have offers you can't turn down!
<PAGE>
Thank you, and have a marvelous day.

<NAME_MOB_REINER>
Righty-o, there you are. And a warm, country
thank-you for your business.
<PAGE>
I'll be sure to let my colleagues know you're
quite the discerning customer. Why, I'm betting
they'll bring you a bountiful bevy of deals.
<PAGE>
Thank you, and have a marvelous day.

<NAME_MOB_REINER>
Thank you, and have a marvelous day.

<NAME_MOB_REINER>
Whoa, hold up just a country minute. You're a
little short on cash today. Ah well, for every deal
you pass up, there's two around the corner!
<PAGE>
I'll be sure to let my colleagues know you're
quite the discerning customer. Why, I'm betting
they'll bring you a bountiful bevy of deals.
